a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number with a drug use disorder by substance, World
Total number of people with a drug use disorder, differentiated by drug/substance type. Drug dependence is
defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three or more indicators of dependence
for at least a month within the previous year.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
